Html:
Hello,

I've tried to copy a worksheet using copy() and clone
but each sheet created that way share the same cells :
when i delete a column in the first sheet, the same column is deleted in the other sheets.

thank
As you don't mention it, I assume you're using the default cache to memory option; in which case, this problem has already been raised as work item 14146 and has been fixed in the latest SVN code

you'r right, i use the default option.

Thank for the quick reply
